ygData.subject: Does heritrix3 have ways to extract licensing from webpages
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Little bit of background: I work at Kennisland, a Dutch think tank that also works for heritage institutions. Kennisland also represents Creative Commons

Hi,


Little bit of background:
I work at Kennisland, a Dutch think tank th=
at also works for heritage institutions. Kennisland also represents Creativ=
e Commons Netherlands. Usually my work resolves around issues regarding cop=
yright and technology. I=E2=80=99ve been introduced to heritrix3 today.


O=
ur national library wants to archive creativecommons.nl <http://creativecom=
mons.nl/>, as Creative Commons I would like to add that this website is lic=
ensed under a CC BY-SA license. As their archiving is done with heritrix3 a=
nd I see that archive.org <http://archive.org/> labels some of its web sour=
ces with CC licenses. See https://archive.org/search.php?query=3Dmediatype%=
3A%28web%29%20AND%20licenseurl%3A%28%2Acreativecommons%2A%29 <https://archi=
ve.org/search.php?query=3Dmediatype:(web)%20AND%20licenseurl:(*creativecomm=
ons*)>


Does it do that as part of the analysis that heritrix3 offers?


C=
heers,


Maarten Zeinstra


--
Kennisland | www.kl.nl <http://www.kl.nl/> |=
 t +31205756720 | m +31643053919 | @mzeinstra
